DOC.brief_summary: Intra-Oral Topical Ketoprofen gel , apply branch trigeminal nerve , show prevent migraine use daily 3 month open label study . This randomized , double-blind , placebo control phase III prevention trial determine safety efficacy .
DOC.detailed_description: This 4 month trial . During first month , prospective headache diary maintain . Migraine frequency , severity ( 1-10 ) , duration , headache medication record . Patients randomize receive active gel placebo gel double blind fashion . Gel apply posterior maxilla daily 3 month . A daily headache diary , outline , maintain throughout trial . Patients may continue take migraine medication , need . No new migraine therapy may start trial .
DOC.criteria: IHS Migraine without aura 18 y.o . old least 4 migraine per month pregnancy headache condition chronic daily headache allergy sensitivity NSAIDs severe illness
